name: TestMod
description:
You may choose relic or card reward and then choose 1 from 3 of that type from this mod at start of each run. Require 'STSLib'. 

开局选择遗物或无色牌之后可以再进行一次对应的可放弃的3选1来获得初始奖励。试做了3个事件和5瓶药水。需要BaseMod和STSLib支持。
